metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16712 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 has a memory leak in Huffman2DEncodeImage in coders/ps3.c, as demonstrated by WritePS3Image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16712` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed as part of CVE-2019-11597

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2').
